title: TBM 50 x Disposable Incontinence Bed Pads 60 x 60 | Absorbent Underpads, Bed Mats, Incontinence Pads, Incontinence sheets, Bed Pads, Premium Incontinence Bed Sheets
features: Odor Control for Incontinence Pads: These incontinence pads are equipped with odor-neutralizing technology to minimize odors, ensuring a fresher environment for users.
Leak-Proof Design Comparable to Mattress Protectors: Featuring a waterproof backing, these pads act as an effective barrier, protecting mattresses like a high-quality mattress protector.
Convenient Disposal with Disposable Bed Pads: As disposable bed pads, they offer easy and hygienic disposal, making cleanup simple and quick.
Ample Coverage in Bed Pads: Available in sizes such as 60 x 90 cm & 60 x 60 cm, these bed pads provide extensive coverage, perfect for securing beds, chairs, and sofas.
Comfortable Top Layer on Incontinence Sheets: The soft top layer provides comfort against the skin, reducing irritation and ensuring a smooth surface, similar to high-quality incontinence sheets.
Durable Construction Like Underpads: TBM bed pads are made to handle extended use without tearing, similar to underpads, providing dependable protection and peace of mind.
Multi-Use as Bed Mats and Large Incontinence Sheets: Ideal for various needs, these bed mats can be used in beds, wheelchairs, and sofas, offering versatile coverage like large incontinence sheets.
Enhanced Surface Protection Like Bed Mats: With a multi-layered design, these pads protect mattresses and bedding from moisture, stains, and damage, similar to traditional bed mats.
Ideal for Daily Use in Care Settings: These incontinence bed pads are essential for caregivers, providing reliable, disposable protection that ensures hygiene and comfort for daily use.
description: Product Description . . . . . . . . . . Are your incontinence bed pads suitable for both men and women? Yes, our disposable incontinence pads are unisex and designed to fit comfortably for both men and women. Who can use incontinence pads? These bed mats are suitable for Individuals with light to heavy incontinence, elderly individuals with mobility issues, post-surgery patients or those recovering from childbirth and people with disabilities requiring additional protection. Are the materials safe for sensitive skin? Yes, our incontinence sheets are dermatologically tested, hypoallergenic, and made with skin-friendly materials to prevent irritation and rashes. Are there specific storage conditions to maintain the incontinence pads' absorbency and integrity? Store unused disposable bed pads in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and moisture. Keep out of reach of children and pets when not in use. Warnings !!!! This product is not a toy. Do not allow pets or children to chew or ingest the disposable pad. If ingestion occurs, seek veterinary or medical attention immediately. Keep away from open flames or heat sources, as the material may be flammable.
